> 
> I totally agree on this, for me a 2.5 meter version would be much more suitable as I don't 3.75 m stuff so much. Keep up the good work! ^^

I got a working TweakScale config for it, but its a few steps.

Go to "GameData > TweakScale > ScaleExponents.cfg

 Search for "noScaledCrewPods = 1" and change it to "noScaledCrewPods = 0"

Save

Go to "GameData > TweakScale > patches" and create a new Textfile

 Paste This Code into it:

    //Shooting Star Pod@PART[Super100] // Super 100 Shooting Star{    %MODULE[TweakScale]    {        type = stack        defaultScale = 3.75    }}

Click "Save as.." and name it "RaptorAerospacial\_TweakScale.cfg"

Save

// It should now be freely Scaleable

The Super 67 Heatshield turns into a Super 100 one upon launch, it says "Super 100 Heatshield" when I right click it, it is 3.75m but has 800 ablator. Is TweakScale to blame?

PartCompiler: Cannot clone model 'RaptorAerospacial/Extras/Heatshield' as model does not exist

Heatshield.cfg has wrong path: 'RaptorAerospacial/Extras/Heatshield' change it to 'Super100/RaptorAerospacial/Extras/Heatshield'

> 
> PartCompiler: Cannot clone model 'RaptorAerospacial/Extras/Heatshield' as model does not exist
> Heatshield.cfg has wrong path: 'RaptorAerospacial/Extras/Heatshield' change it to 'Super100/RaptorAerospacial/Extras/Heatshield'

That's actually a fault of your installation. The folder "RaptorAerospacial" should sit inside "GameData", not the "Super100" folder.

The Super 100 does appear in career mode community tech tree. How do I unlock it?

Super 67 unlocks with standard 3 man pods. I normally avoid using it for one more tech level. The Super 100 is completely missing.

EDIT found near end of space planes. Moved to TechRequired = heavyCommandModules. Good now I need to incorporate the CLS module to get it working properly. It is a great command capsule and work tweaking to perfection.
